title: Wanted T206 Joe Doyle Tolstoi- buy prices listed
author: nodgrass

posts.post_title: Wanted T206 Joe Doyle Tolstoi- buy prices listed
posts.post_content:
I have been looking for a Joe Doyle with Tolstoi back to complete my backs collection of the card. So, here is what I am willing to pay for the card:

PSA 5 or SGC equivalent - $950
PSA 4 or SGC equivalent- $700
PSA 3 or SGC equivalent- $550
PSA 2 or SGC equivalent- $350
PSA 1.5 or SGC equivalent-$300
PSA 1 or SGC equivalent- depending on severity of flaws, up to $250

Prices adjusted slightly for other half grades not listed.
I am also interested in unaltered ungraded cards. 
Please contact me through forum messaging. Thanks
